target.description: Calculate the arcsine of a value in radians.
target.name: calculate_arcsin

target.code:
from sympy import atan, deg
def calculate_angle(tan_alpha, tan_beta):
    angle = (tan_alpha - tan_beta) / (1 + tan_alpha * tan_beta)
    return angle
target.description: Calculate angle in degrees from tangent values.
target.name: calculate_angle

target.code:
from sympy import acos, deg

def calculate_triangle_angles_all(a, b, c):
    A = deg(acos((b**2 + c**2 - a**2) / (2 * b * c)))
    B = deg(acos((a**2 + c**2 - b**2) / (2 * a * c)))
    C = deg(acos((a**2 + b**2 - c**2) / (2 * a * b)))
    return A, B, C
target.description: Calculate all angles of a triangle given its side lengths using the cosine rule.
target.name: calculate_triangle_angles_all

target.code:
from sympy import acos, deg

def calculate_triangle_angles(a, b, c):
    angle_A = deg(acos((b**2 + c**2 - a**2) / (2 * b * c)))
    angle_B = deg(acos((a**2 + c**2 - b**2) / (2 * a * c)))
    angle_C = deg(acos((a**2 + b**2 - c**2) / (2 * a * b)))
    return angle_A, angle_B, angle_C
target.description: Calculate angles of a triangle given its side lengths using the cosine rule.
target.name: calculate_triangle_angles

target.description: Calculate the arccosine value given a side length. Returns the angle in radians.
target.name: calculate_arccos
